law.catch_line: Rape crisis center board -- Membership and duties.

text.section: A rape crisis center designated by the cabinet shall establish a board consisting of at least fifteen (15) members. At least one (1) member shall represent each county located in the area development district served by the center.

law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 3, effective July 14, 2000.
